Additional detail regarding this form of process description can be found in ISO/IEC TR 24774. 5.5.3 General characteristics of processes In addition to the basic attributes described in the previous subclause, processes may be characterized by other attributes common to all processes. ISO/IEC 33020:2015 identifies common process attributes that characterize six levels of achievement within a measurement framework for process capability.
